forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 62. West southwest wind 10 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West southwest wind 9 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

weather_report:
Today in Downtown San Francisco, the weather awakens to a mostly sunny canvas, the kind that invites both optimism and a gentle cool breeze. As the sun climbs, it casts a soft glow over the city, with temperatures nudging near 62 degrees. The west-southwest winds, carrying whispers of the ocean, flirt with the trees at 10 to 18 mph, occasionally gusting as if trying to remind us of the coastal presence. In the distance, the iconic Golden Gate Bridge stands resilient, though it may occasionally dissolve into the soft embrace of the fog, a reminder of the city's maritime influence.

As evening approaches, the skies will transition to a partly cloudy palette, the air settling slightly cooler to around 52 degrees. Those venturing out might savor the fluctuation, enjoying a light sweater or a stylish jacket to guard against the evening chill. It’s a splendid day to explore the local cafes, where the aroma of roasted coffee dances through the air, or perhaps a leisurely stroll along the waterfront as the sun melts into the horizon, illuminating the bay in hues of amber and gold. All told, the day suggests comfort wrapped in gentle breezes and picturesque views, an invitation to embrace the serene charm of this vibrant city.
